ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How did you play when you were 15th?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Getting a group to do this has been one of the most difficult things for me to do.  I must be presenting myself in a way that makes me sound cowardly. But
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Michel Lagace [mailto:e-wolf@...]

> try to pick locations where the group can get started on easy
> creatures and
> get a feel for things before taking on tougher fights and
> risking death.

Getting a group to do this has been one of the most difficult things for me
to do. I must be presenting myself in a way that makes me sound cowardly.
But I'm glad to know I'm not the only one who thinks this is a good idea.

> BTW, the idea behind my guild (Imperturbable Fellowship) is
> to learn the
> various classes (capabilities and limitations) and grouping
> strategies that
> promote teamwork, strong communication and lots of fun.

Too bad we're on different servers. I think I'd love that guild.

> Aanluil <Imperturbable Fellowship>

You were looking for a last name, right? How do you pronounce the first?

Peace
Evulia, bard of 11 missed notes, Tunare
